alert.note: Alert for Champaign (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 29 at 8:32PM CDT until August 29 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN VERMILION AND SOUTHEASTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTIES... At 832 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Muncie to near Broadlands, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fithian, Muncie, Oakwood, Catlin, Fairmount, Sidell, Danville, Westville, Tilton, Ridge Farm and Belgium. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 192 and 220. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
